languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт едва заметно склоняет голову.{/n} "Я изгнала тень сомнения из твоих мыслей касательно моей природы. Теперь же ответь на мой вопрос — зачем ты обратил{mf|ся|ась} ко мне?"
{n}Yrliet inclines her head by an infinitesimal amount.{/n} "I have banished the shadow of doubt from your thoughts regarding my nature. Now you will answer my question — why have you sought me out?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт едва заметно склоняет голову.{/n} "Я изгнала тень сомнения из твоих мыслей касательно моей природы. Теперь же ответь на мой вопрос — зачем ты обратил{mf|ся|ась} ко мне?"

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特几乎微不可见地歪了歪头。{/n}“你怀疑我的本性，但我已经把怀疑的阴影从你的想法中驱逐出去了。现在，轮到你回答我的问题了：你为什么来找我？”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet inclines her head by an infinitesimal amount.{/n} "I have banished the shadow of doubt from your thoughts regarding my nature. Now you will answer my question — why have you sought me out?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特几乎微不可见地歪了歪头。{/n}“你怀疑我的本性，但我已经把怀疑的阴影从你的想法中驱逐出去了。现在，轮到你回答我的问题了：你为什么来找我？”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet mueve muy ligeramente la cabeza.{/n} «He desterrado la sombra de la duda sobre mi naturaleza. Ahora responde a mi pregunta: ¿por qué me buscas?».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet inclines her head by an infinitesimal amount.{/n} "I have banished the shadow of doubt from your thoughts regarding my nature. Now you will answer my question — why have you sought me out?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet mueve muy ligeramente la cabeza.{/n} «He desterrado la sombra de la duda sobre mi naturaleza. Ahora responde a mi pregunta: ¿por qué me buscas?».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはごくわずかに首をかしげる。{/n}「私の出自に関する疑念は晴れたはずだ。次は我の問いに答えてもらおう。なぜ我を探し求めた？」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet inclines her head by an infinitesimal amount.{/n} "I have banished the shadow of doubt from your thoughts regarding my nature. Now you will answer my question — why have you sought me out?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはごくわずかに首をかしげる。{/n}「私の出自に関する疑念は晴れたはずだ。次は我の問いに答えてもらおう。なぜ我を探し求めた？」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet senkt ihren Kopf unmerklich.{/n} "Ich habe den Schatten des Zweifels, was meine Natur angeht, aus Euren Gedanken verbannt. Beantwortet mir nun meine Frage – warum habt Ihr mich aufgesucht?"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet inclines her head by an infinitesimal amount.{/n} "I have banished the shadow of doubt from your thoughts regarding my nature. Now you will answer my question — why have you sought me out?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet senkt ihren Kopf unmerklich.{/n} "Ich habe den Schatten des Zweifels, was meine Natur angeht, aus Euren Gedanken verbannt. Beantwortet mir nun meine Frage – warum habt Ihr mich aufgesucht?"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet hoche la tête presque imperceptiblement.{/n} « Maintenant que j'ai chassé le doute de vos pensées concernant ma nature, vous allez répondre à ma question : pourquoi me cherchiez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet inclines her head by an infinitesimal amount.{/n} "I have banished the shadow of doubt from your thoughts regarding my nature. Now you will answer my question — why have you sought me out?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet hoche la tête presque imperceptiblement.{/n} « Maintenant que j'ai chassé le doute de vos pensées concernant ma nature, vous allez répondre à ma question : pourquoi me cherchiez-vous ? »

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet inclines her head by an infinitesimal amount.{/n} "I have banished the shadow of doubt from your thoughts regarding my nature. Now you will answer my question — why have you sought me out?"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet başını çok hafifçe eğiyor.{/n} "Tabiatıma dair şüphe içeren düşüncelerini bertaraf ettim. Şimdi de sen benim sorumu yanıtlayacaksın: Neden benim peşime düştün?"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet inclines her head by an infinitesimal amount.{/n} "I have banished the shadow of doubt from your thoughts regarding my nature. Now you will answer my question — why have you sought me out?"
